nodes.documentation:
Smart contract to create and manage a Vcrey Auction.
The auction could be in 6 different Phase:
- Glory phase: no action could be done in this phase;
- Commitment phase: anyone (excpet for seller and manager) can commit a bid,
  the bidder must provide the sha3 of a nonce + the value of the bid and must
  send the deposit to the contract;
- Withdrawal phase: all bidder that commit a bid could withdraw their bid
  losing half of their deposit sent in the commitment phase;
- Opening phase: all bidder that don't whitdraw their bid have to open their
  bid, sending the right value of the bid to the contract and passing the nonce
  used in the sha3 function;
- Finilizing phase: the auction is finished, the seller or the winner have to
  confirm the end of it moving to the pending phase;
- Pending phase: the winner has to perform the transfer of the value at which
  the good has been sell (i.e. his bid).

* In some particular case, the manager of the auctions can change the phase or
can interact with the contract to avoid ambiguous situation.
The creation and the destruction of the auction will pass throught the contract manager.
nodes.name: VicreyAuction
LogNewPhase
LogNewHighest
LogNewPrice
LogEnd
LogPending

nodes.documentation:
Modifier to check if the function is called in the correct phase

    * @param _phase  phase related to the function.
nodes.name: atPhase

nodes.documentation: Modifier to change the phase based on block mined.
nodes.name: changePhase

nodes.documentation:
Modifier to avoid that the seller or the manager make a bid
OR buy out the good.
nodes.name: canInteract

nodes.documentation: Modifier to permit only to seller and manager to change phase manually.
nodes.name: canChangePhase

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "The reserve price must be grater than zero!"

arguments.value: The reserve price must be grater than zero!

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "The reserve price must be grater than zero!"

nodes.documentation:
Manually go forward to the next Phase, only seller or manager can change it.
5 block must be mined from the last phase change and the phase cannot be changed
if it is in Filizing or Pending.

    * modifier canChangePhase(): check if the fuction has been called by the seller
OR the manager
nodes.name: nextPhase

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "You cannot commit 2 different bid. If you do not already commit a bid, make sure to send the deposit amount correctly!"

arguments.value: You cannot commit 2 different bid. If you do not already commit a bid, make sure to send the deposit amount correctly!

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "You cannot commit 2 different bid. If you do not already commit a bid, make sure to send the deposit amount correctly!"

nodes.documentation:
Commit a new bid. Check if the address doesn't already commit a bid
and if the bidder is not the seller or the manager.

    * @param hashValue sha3 of nonce + bid value.

    * modifier changePhase(): check if the phase can change (i.e. 5 block have
been mined from last phase change).

    * modifier atPhase(Phase.Commitment): check if the phase is the right one.

    * modifier canInteract(): check if the caller of the function is not the seller
OR the manager.
nodes.name: commit

nodes.documentation:
Withdraw a bid. Check if the sender commit a bid for the auction
send back half of the deposit to the sender.

    * modifier changePhase(): check if the phase can change (i.e. 5 block have
been mined from last phase change).

    * modifier atPhase(Phase.Withdrawal): check if the phase is the right one.
nodes.name: withdraw

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Your bid is lower than the reserve price, you lose your deposit!"

arguments.value: Your bid is lower than the reserve price, you lose your deposit!

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Your bid is lower than the reserve price, you lose your deposit!"

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "No match, provide the correct nonce and bid or you will lose your deposit!"

arguments.value: No match, provide the correct nonce and bid or you will lose your deposit!

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "No match, provide the correct nonce and bid or you will lose your deposit!"

nodes.documentation:
Open a bid. Check if the sender commit a bid for the auction and
if the nonce + the bid value match the hash sent in the commitment
phase and if the value of the bid is grater than the reserve price.
Give back all the deposit to the sender if he provides the
right value of the nonce and the bid. If the bid is the highest one,
update the highest bid and update the price with the old highest bid.
If the bid is not the highest one, but it is grater than the actual price,
update the actual price.
Emit an event if the highest bid or the actual price are updated.

    * @param nonce string used to produce the provided hash in the commitment phase.

    * modifier changePhase(): check if the phase can change (i.e. 5 block have
been mined from last phase change).

    * modifier atPhase(Phase.Opening): check if the phase is the right one.
nodes.name: openBid

nodes.documentation:
Finilize the auction to confirm the end of it and the amount that
the winner have to pay for the good. The amount is freez in the contract
and the payment become pending.
Emit an event to declare the end of the auction.

    * modifier changePhase(): check if the phase can change (i.e. 5 block have
been mined from last phase change).

    * modifier atPhase(Phase.Finilizing): check if the phase is the right one.
nodes.name: finalize

nodes.documentation:
Extinguish the payment freezed in the finilizing phase.
The winner have 1440 mined block to do it, otherwise the manager
can tranfer the pending amount to the seller, or give back the
amount to the winner (e.g. the seller don't send the good to the winner).
Emit an event to declare the end of pending payment.

    * modifier atPhase(Phase.Pending): check if the phase is the right one.
nodes.name: transferPending
incrementPhase

Extinguish the payment freezed in the finilizing phase.
The winner have 1440 mined block to do it, otherwise the manager

amount to the winner (e.g. the seller don't send the good to the winner).

incrementPhase

params.hashValue: sha3 of nonce + bid value.     * modifier changePhase(): check if the phase can change (i.e. 5 block have been mined from last phase change).     * modifier atPhase(Phase.Commitment): check if the phase is the right one.     * modifier canInteract(): check if the caller of the function is not the seller OR the manager.

params.depositValue: amount of deposit to provide in the commitment;

params.nonce: string used to produce the provided hash in the commitment phase.     * modifier changePhase(): check if the phase can change (i.e. 5 block have been mined from last phase change).     * modifier atPhase(Phase.Opening): check if the phase is the right one.

commit(bytes32).notice: Commit a new bid. Check if the address doesn't already commit a bid and if the bidder is not the seller or the manager.

methods.constructor: Contract constructor, it can be called from the contract manager and it need the address of the seller and of the manager.

finalize().notice: Finilize the auction to confirm the end of it and the amount that the winner have to pay for the good. The amount is freez in the contract and the payment become pending. Emit an event to declare the end of the auction.     * modifier changePhase(): check if the phase can change (i.e. 5 block have been mined from last phase change).     * modifier atPhase(Phase.Finilizing): check if the phase is the right one.

nextPhase().notice: Manually go forward to the next Phase, only seller or manager can change it. 5 block must be mined from the last phase change and the phase cannot be changed if it is in Filizing or Pending.     * modifier canChangePhase(): check if the fuction has been called by the seller OR the manager

openBid(string).notice: Open a bid. Check if the sender commit a bid for the auction and if the nonce + the bid value match the hash sent in the commitment phase and if the value of the bid is grater than the reserve price. Give back all the deposit to the sender if he provides the right value of the nonce and the bid. If the bid is the highest one, update the highest bid and update the price with the old highest bid. If the bid is not the highest one, but it is grater than the actual price, update the actual price. Emit an event if the highest bid or the actual price are updated.

transferPending().notice: Extinguish the payment freezed in the finilizing phase. The winner have 1440 mined block to do it, otherwise the manager can tranfer the pending amount to the seller, or give back the amount to the winner (e.g. the seller don't send the good to the winner). Emit an event to declare the end of pending payment.     * modifier atPhase(Phase.Pending): check if the phase is the right one.

withdraw().notice: Withdraw a bid. Check if the sender commit a bid for the auction send back half of the deposit to the sender.     * modifier changePhase(): check if the phase can change (i.e. 5 block have been mined from last phase change).     * modifier atPhase(Phase.Withdrawal): check if the phase is the right one.

userdoc.notice: Smart contract to create and manage a Vcrey Auction. The auction could be in 6 different Phase: - Glory phase: no action could be done in this phase; - Commitment phase: anyone (excpet for seller and manager) can commit a bid,  the bidder must provide the sha3 of a nonce + the value of the bid and must  send the deposit to the contract; - Withdrawal phase: all bidder that commit a bid could withdraw their bid  losing half of their deposit sent in the commitment phase; - Opening phase: all bidder that don't whitdraw their bid have to open their  bid, sending the right value of the bid to the contract and passing the nonce  used in the sha3 function; - Finilizing phase: the auction is finished, the seller or the winner have to  confirm the end of it moving to the pending phase; - Pending phase: the winner has to perform the transfer of the value at which  the good has been sell (i.e. his bid).  * In some particular case, the manager of the auctions can change the phase or can interact with the contract to avoid ambiguous situation. The creation and the destruction of the auction will pass throught the contract manager.
